MLB Positions

Source: R/mlb_positions.R
mlb_positions.Rd

MLB Positions

Usage

mlb_positions()

Value

Returns a tibble with the following columns

col_nametypes
position_short_namecharacter
position_full_namecharacter
position_abbreviationcharacter
position_codecharacter
position_typecharacter
position_formal_namecharacter
game_positionlogical
pitcherlogical
fielderlogical
outfieldlogical
position_display_namecharacter

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(mlb_positions())
#>      position_short_name    position_full_name position_abbreviation
#> 1                Pitcher               Pitcher                     P
#> 2                Catcher               Catcher                     C
#> 3               1st Base            First Base                    1B
#> 4               2nd Base           Second Base                    2B
#> 5               3rd Base            Third Base                    3B
#> 6              Shortstop             Shortstop                    SS
#> 7             Left Field            Outfielder                    LF
#> 8           Center Field            Outfielder                    CF
#> 9            Right Field            Outfielder                    RF
#> 10     Designated Hitter     Designated Hitter                    DH
#> 11          Pinch Hitter          Pinch Hitter                    PH
#> 12          Pinch Runner          Pinch Runner                    PR
#> 13          Extra Hitter          Extra Hitter                    EH
#> 14           Base Runner           Base Runner                    BR
#> 15              Outfield              Outfield                    OF
#> 16               Infield               Infield                    IF
#> 17      Starting Pitcher      Starting Pitcher                    SP
#> 18        Relief Pitcher        Relief Pitcher                    RP
#> 19                Closer                Closer                    CP
#> 20               Utility               Utility                    UT
#> 21     Utility Infielder     Utility Infielder                    UI
#> 22    Utility Outfielder    Utility Outfielder                    UO
#> 23  Right-Handed Pitcher  Right-Handed Pitcher                   RHP
#> 24   Left-Handed Pitcher   Left-Handed Pitcher                   LHP
#> 25  Right-Handed Starter  Right-Handed Starter                   RHS
#> 26   Left-Handed Starter   Left-Handed Starter                   LHS
#> 27  Left-Handed Reliever  Left-Handed Reliever                   LHR
#> 28 Right-Handed Reliever Right-Handed Reliever                   RHR
#> 29   Pitcher - Infielder   Pitcher - Infielder                  P-IF
#> 30  Pitcher - Outfielder  Pitcher - Outfielder                  P-OF
#> 31     Pitcher - Utility     Pitcher - Utility                  P-UT
#> 32        Two-Way Player        Two-Way Player                   TWP
#> 33                Batter                Batter                     B
#> 34               Unknown               Unknown                     X
#> 35       Runner on First       Runner on First                    R1
#> 36      Runner on Second      Runner on Second                    R2
#> 37       Runner on Third       Runner on Third                    R3
#>    position_code  position_type  position_formal_name
#> 1              1        Pitcher               Pitcher
#> 2              2        Catcher               Catcher
#> 3              3      Infielder         First Baseman
#> 4              4      Infielder        Second Baseman
#> 5              5      Infielder         Third Baseman

#> 16             I      Infielder               Infield
#> 17             S        Pitcher      Starting Pitcher

#> 19             C        Pitcher                Closer
#> 20             U      Infielder               Utility
#> 21             V      Infielder     Utility Infielder

#> 23             K        Pitcher  Right-Handed Pitcher
#> 24             L        Pitcher   Left-Handed Pitcher
#> 25             M        Pitcher  Right-Handed Starter
#> 26             N        Pitcher   Left-Handed Starter
#> 27             G        Pitcher  Left-Handed Reliever
#> 28             F        Pitcher Right-Handed Reliever
#> 29             A Two-Way Player   Pitcher - Infielder
#> 30             J Two-Way Player  Pitcher - Outfielder
#> 31             Z Two-Way Player     Pitcher - Utility
